languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, в офицерской кают-компании произошел инцидент. Служебный пес Глейто, принадлежащий почтенному проктору Антару, не пускает офицеров в помещение. По просьбе уважаемого проктора, ему было выделено место для работы... Но не вся же кают-компания!"
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, в офицерской кают-компании произошел инцидент. Служебный пес Глейто, принадлежащий почтенному проктору Антару, не пускает офицеров в помещение. По просьбе уважаемого проктора, ему было выделено место для работы... Но не вся же кают-компания!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, in der Offiziersmesse gab es einen Zwischenfall. Glaito, der Hund des geschätzten Proktors Anthar, lässt keine Offiziere in den Raum. Auf Anfrage des geschätzten Proktors erhielt dieser dort einen Arbeitsplatz ... aber doch nicht den ganzen Raum."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, in der Offiziersmesse gab es einen Zwischenfall. Glaito, der Hund des geschätzten Proktors Anthar, lässt keine Offiziere in den Raum. Auf Anfrage des geschätzten Proktors erhielt dieser dort einen Arbeitsplatz ... aber doch nicht den ganzen Raum."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, un problème est survenu dans le carré des officiers. Glaito, le chien de l'honorable proctor Anthar, refuse de laisser entrer qui que ce soit. L'honorable proctor nous avait demandé de lui attribuer un espace pour qu'il puisse y travailler... mais il ne peut pas s'approprier la salle entière ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, un problème est survenu dans le carré des officiers. Glaito, le chien de l'honorable proctor Anthar, refuse de laisser entrer qui que ce soit. L'honorable proctor nous avait demandé de lui attribuer un espace pour qu'il puisse y travailler... mais il ne peut pas s'approprier la salle entière ! »

languages.text: 「閣下、士官室で事件が発生しました。尊敬すべきアンサール代理人の飼い犬グライトが、士官たちを部屋に入れようとしません。尊敬すべき代理人の要望により、あの部屋に作業用の場所を割り当てたのは事実ですが…部屋全体を占有する許可は出していません！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、士官室で事件が発生しました。尊敬すべきアンサール代理人の飼い犬グライトが、士官たちを部屋に入れようとしません。尊敬すべき代理人の要望により、あの部屋に作業用の机を割り当てたのは事実ですが…部屋全体を占有する許可は出していません！」

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, se ha producido un incidente en la sala de oficiales. Glaito, el perro del estimado Procurador Anthar, no permite que entren oficiales. A petición del estimado Procurador, se le había cedido un espacio para que trabajara... ¡pero no la sala entera!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, se ha producido un incidente en la sala de oficiales. Glaito, el perro del estimado Procurador Anthar, no permite que entren oficiales. A petición del estimado Procurador, se le había cedido un espacio para que trabajara... ¡pero no la sala entera!».

languages.text: “舰长大人，军官室里发生了事故。尊敬的安萨监察官，他的狗格雷托禁止任何军官进入房间。根据尊敬的监察官的要求，我们为他在军官室内分配了办公空间……但我可以保证，我们没有把整个军官室都分配给他！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，军官室里发生了事故。尊敬的安萨监察官，他的狗格雷托禁止任何军官进入房间。根据尊敬的监察官的要求，我们为他在军官室内分配了办公空间……但我可以保证，我们没有把整个军官室都分配给他！”

languages.text: "Sayın {mf|Lordum|Leydim}, subay salonunda bir olay cereyan etti. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen Anthar'ın köpeği Glaito, subayların içeri girmesine izin vermiyor. Talebi üzerine saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'e tahsisli bir alan mevcut zaten, koca salonu kendisine ayıramayız ya!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there has been an incident in the wardroom. The esteemed Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito won't let officers into the room. At the esteemed Proctor's request, he was assigned a space to work there... but, my word, not the whole area!"

traits.locale_text: "Sayın {mf|Lordum|Leydim}, subay salonunda bir olay cereyan etti. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen Anthar'ın köpeği Glaito, subayların içeri girmesine izin vermiyor. Talebi üzerine saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'e tahsisli bir alan mevcut zaten, koca salonu kendisine ayıramayız ya!"
